name: LinkedIn
blurb: The best way to make initial contact is through my LinkedIn profileConnect with me!. Thank you!

name: GitHub
blurb: My GitHub profileSee my work! includes projects I completed as a student, side projects of my own, and many projects I have created to give LaunchCode students extra practice.

name: HackerRank
blurb: When I'm learning a new language or tool, I run through practice problems on HackerRankCheck out my skills! and have earned several badges and certifications.

name: YouTube
blurb: Lectures I've given for students at LaunchCode can be found on multiple playlists on my YouTube channelCheck out my videos!. You'll also find topical tutorials, break timers, and more.
